name: 葉明豐
objective: 機率空間；組合分析；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；慣矩母函數及特徵函數；大數法則及中央極限定理；隨機漫步及帕森程序。
schedule:
Week 1: Ch. 1. Introduction to statistics and data analysis
Week 2~4: Ch. 2. Probability
Week 5: Quiz #1 & Ch. 3. Random variables and probability distribution
Week 6~8: Ch. 3. Random variables and probability distribution
Week 9: Midterm exam
Week 10~11: Ch. 4. Mathematic expectation
Week 12~14: Ch. 5. Some discrete probability distributions
Week 15: Quiz #2 & Ch. 6. Some continuous probability distributions
Week 16~17: Ch. 6. Some continuous probability distributions
Week 18: Final exam.
scorePolicy: Quiz #1: 25%, Midterm Exam: 25%, Quiz #2: 25%, Final Exam: 25%
materials: Ronald E. Walpole, Raymond H. Myers, Sharon L. Myers, Keying Ye, Probability & Statistics for Engineers and Scientists, 9th Edition, Pearson.
